TopicTitle: Where can I download the C7 add-on ?

Articles.Content:
most links in this website seem to be broken.

http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.net/kerbal-space-program-mods#para

does any one know any alternate links.

Thanks.
hmmm. U can get full version for the C7 parts, as for the demo idk

Attachments and links to the forum made before the Aug 3rd move to vBulletin are broken. There's nothing we can do to change this. All the C7 parts are included in the full game now, so why not pick it up for $18 before they raise the price again. It's well worth the money as you'll get many more hours out of this game than you will from some $60 AAA titles.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Hi dynastyreaper, the old C7 Aerospace Devision - part 3 pack can be found, if you use the search box
are ALL the C7 parts in the game now? I remember a Mk2 fuselage style SAS that wasnt included when they got added to stock... I could be thinking of another mod though with modded C7 bits

The SAS was turned into a nosecone avionics package.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
ahh that makes sense, but I found said post here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/1004-C7-Aerospace-Division-Part-3-%28Experimental-Gear-plugin-in-first-post%29
